author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
As 2025 begins, a quiet but devastating mortgage crisis is sweeping across China. Millions of once-hopeful homeowners are now defaulting on their loans, abandoning their apartments, and watching their life savings vanish. From ghost cities to collapsed marriages, from economic despair to open protests — this is the untold story of a collapsing housing market, financial repression, and the lives shattered in the fallout.

▶️ In this video, we dive deep into the real human cost behind China’s real estate crash:

Why are so many walking away from their homes?

What happens when you default in China?

How does this compare to the 2008 housing crash in the U.S.?

What are the social, legal, and emotional consequences?
title: China’s Housing Collapse: Millions Are Walking Away from Their Homes
